description:
ZEON Network (ZEON) bills itself as a decentralized platform for financial services. The ZEON Wallet is an Ethereum and Bitcoin wallet which can be installed on Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Brave, iOS, and Android. The project plans to introduce a contactless payment card in 2019 to enable users to spend the ZEON token like traditional money. The ZEON team is reportedly developing its own public high-throughput blockchain platform with sharding.

name: ZEON
